data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: The head and thorax are dark green with a canary-yellow band on the side. The leat____ front wi___ are gr___ with ma__ yellow sp___; t__ legs a__ blue, with a yellow serr____ pattern o_ the hi__ legs. The abdomen is black with bright red bands.
data.fullContent: The head and thorax are dark green with a canary-yellow band on the side. The leathery front wings are green with many yellow spots; the legs are blue, with a yellow serrated pattern on the hind legs. The abdomen is black with bright red bands.
data.answer: 头部和胸部呈深绿色，侧面有一条金丝雀黄色的带子。坚韧的前翅是绿色的，有许多黄色斑点；它的腿是蓝色的，后腿上有一个黄色的锯齿状图案。腹部呈黑色，有鲜红色的条纹。
